explanation: The objects involved in completing the task mentioned are the Knife, Cup, Mug, Table, Kitchen island, and Sponge. The Knife will be placed in the Cup, the Mug with the Knife will be placed on the Table, a Mug with a Knife in it will also be placed on the Table, a Mug holding a Knife will be placed on the Table by a Sponge, and a Cup containing a Knife will be put on the Kitchen island.
